emails.subject: Project Alpha Status Update
emails.body:
Hello Team,
Here is the latest status on Project Alpha. We have completed the UI design and begun integration testing. The API endpoints have been defined and documented. Next steps include performance testing and a user acceptance criteria review. Please let me know if there are any blockers.

Regards,
Sarah

emails.subject: Re: Project Alpha Status Update
emails.body:
Thanks for the update, Sarah.
Integration testing is progressing well, and we should have the first results by Thursday. No major issues so far. Will keep you posted.

- Alex

emails.subject: Re: Project Alpha Status Update
emails.body: Great work, everyone. Letâ€™s ensure we document all test cases thoroughly and schedule the UAT session by early next week. Thanks again for the swift progress.
